languages.text: "Дадим мальпийцам доказать силу своих убеждений на суровом испытании веры".
"We shall allow the Malpians to prove the strength of their convictions through a severe trial of faith."
languages.original_text: "Дадим мальпийцам доказать силу своих убеждений на суровом испытании веры".

traits.locale_text: "We shall allow the Malfesians to prove the strength of their convictions during the severe challenge of their faith."
"We shall allow the Malfesians to prove the strength of their convictions during the severe challenge of their faith."
"We shall allow the Malpians to prove the strength of their convictions through a severe trial of faith."
"We shall allow the Malpians to prove the strength of their convictions through a severe trial of faith."
"We shall allow the Malpians to prove the strength of their convictions through a severe trial of faith."

languages.text: “我们会让马尔皮人参加严峻的信仰考验，以此证明他们的信仰。”
languages.original_text: "We shall allow the Malpians to prove the strength of their convictions through a severe trial of faith."

traits.locale_text: “我们会让马尔皮人参加严峻的信仰考验，以此证明他们的信仰。”

languages.text: «Permitiremos que los malpianos prueben la fuerza de sus convicciones a través de una dura prueba de fe».
languages.original_text: "We shall allow the Malpians to prove the strength of their convictions through a severe trial of faith."

traits.locale_text: «Permitiremos que los malpianos prueben la fuerza de sus convicciones a través de una dura prueba de fe».

languages.text: 「厳しい信仰の試練を通じて、マルピ人の信念の強さを証明させるとしよう」
languages.original_text: "We shall allow the Malpians to prove the strength of their convictions through a severe trial of faith."

traits.locale_text: 「厳しい信仰の試練を通じて、マルピ人の信念の強さを証明させるとしよう」

languages.text: « Nous permettrons aux Malpiens de prouver la force de leurs convictions dans le cadre d'une épreuve de foi des plus strictes. »
languages.original_text: "We shall allow the Malpians to prove the strength of their convictions through a severe trial of faith."

traits.locale_text: « Nous permettrons aux Malpiens de prouver la force de leurs convictions dans le cadre d'une épreuve de foi des plus strictes. »

languages.text: "Wir gestatten den Malpianern, durch eine strenge Glaubensprüfung zu beweisen, wie stark ihre Überzeugung ist."
languages.original_text: "We shall allow the Malpians to prove the strength of their convictions through a severe trial of faith."

traits.locale_text: "Wir gestatten den Malpianern, durch eine strenge Glaubensprüfung zu beweisen, wie stark ihre Überzeugung ist."
